General.Name: Xuchang Yuandong Drive Shaft Co Ltd
General.Description: Xuchang Yuandong Drive Shaft Co.Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of transmission drive shafts and related components in China. The company provides engineering vehicle drive shafts, passenger car drive shafts, commercial vehicle drive shafts, non-constant velocity and constant velocity drive shafts, and dynamic shafts, as well as drive shaft parts. Its products are used in commercial vehicles, special vehicles, and passenger cars, as well as construction machinery comprising loaders and cranes. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Xuchang, China.

1.Name: Mr. Xiling  Ma
1.Title: Chief Engineer, Deputy GM & Non-Independent Director
